backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with types for media, tutorials, posts, products, orders, user profiles, AI interactions, and comparison modules.
backend/token.mo: Implements a token system with balances, transaction histories, and functions for minting, transferring, spending, and querying tokens.
feature_evidence.json: Provides evidence metadata for a production release feature, listing related files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/PRODUCTION_RELEASE.md: Checklist documenting steps required to publish the draft frontend build to production.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_CHECKLIST.md: Smoke test checklist outlining critical functionality to verify after deploying to production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring routes, authentication state, profile setup modal, theme provider, and global AI chat tutor.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog for creating products with image uploads, previews, validation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/AddTutorialDialo: Dialog for adding tutorials, supporting new or existing video uploads, difficulty selection, and backend creation.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistantPanel: Provides an AI learning assistant panel that fetches timed video feedback, toggles assistant state, and logs history for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AIChatTutor.tsx: Implements a chat-based AI tutor that stores chat history, sends user messages, and generates canned AI responses with typing simulation.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Shopping cart drawer enabling quantity edits, token or Stripe checkout, and validation based on user profile and configuration.
frontend/src/components/DepositICPDialog: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout that handles navigation, authentication, user profile data, cart state, and header UI rendering.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Displays a centered animated loading icon and message while the app initializes.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibraryMana: Admin/user interface for uploading, listing, and deleting media files with progress tracking and permissions checks.
frontend/src/components/MintTokensDialog: Modal for admins to mint tokens by specifying a recipient principal, amount, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to create their profile with username and bio, then save it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/SendTokensDialog: Modal for sending tokens to another principal with validation for balance and input fields.
frontend/src/components/ShareRecordingDi: Dialog allowing users to upload a video or audio file and create a community post, awarding tokens on success.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigDial: Dialog component allowing admins to enter a Stripe secret key and allowed country codes, submitting them through a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, stored identity handling, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, token balances, transactions, and other backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/src/lib/cartStore.ts: Zustand store holding cart items with actions to add, update, remove, clear items, and compute total quantity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, QueryClient, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard providing tabs for managing media, tutorials, products, payments, and tokens with access control checks.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Renders the community posts page with authentication-aware actions, post sharing, and admin/user-controlled deletion via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, featured tutorials and products, and navigation to learning, community, and store sections.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Provides tutorial browsing, filtering, playback, completion rewards, and admin tutorial creation with video handling and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to return to the store or homepage.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays payment success, invalidates related queries, triggers a reward toast, and offers navigation to wallet or store.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile, token balance, uploaded and purchased content, with login and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays product listings with add‑to‑cart and admin deletion capabilities, plus product creation for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: React page showing user's token wallet, including balance, transaction history, and a send-tokens dialog with identity and profile checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, feature requests, and known issues for a 3D ocarina store app.
